metadata.title: CVE-2020-26570 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Oberthur smart card software driver in OpenSC before 0.21.0-rc1 has aheap-based buffer overflow in sc_oberthur_read_file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26570` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opensc package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.17.0-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
